name: part_009
file: tmp_【LIVEあり！ゲストあり！】holoXついに◯◯進出！？刮目せよ！我ら #SSholoX2周年 [7R2Q1xjz8eU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Roboco-san and Aki Rosenthal attempt the 'Mukamuka Horns' game with La+ Darknesss, resulting in a spectacular explosion and blackened faces.
The members switch, and Sakamata Chloe and Kazama Iroha prepare to take their turn holding La+.
Sakamata Chloe and Kazama Iroha attempt the challenge. Despite their careful movements and tactical planning, they eventually trigger the explosion.
The aftermath of the second failure. The group discusses the difficulty of the game and switches to the 'Brain' duo.
Takane Lui and Hakui Koyori prepare for their attempt, emphasizing their bond and intelligence.

subtitles.original: いけいけいけいけ！
subtitles.english: Go, go, go, go!

subtitles.original: わー！ちょっと待って待って！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Wait, wait, wait!

subtitles.original: おーおーおー、大丈夫？いいのそれ？
subtitles.english: Whoa, whoa, whoa, is that okay? Is that okay?

subtitles.original: うわー！刺さってる刺さってる！
subtitles.english: Whoa! It's sticking! It's sticking in!

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと待って！あ、刺さってる！
subtitles.english: Ah, wait a second! Ah, it's stuck!

subtitles.original: あれ？焦げ臭い…なんで？なんか臭いんだけど。
subtitles.english: Huh? It smells burnt... why? Something smells.

subtitles.original: いや、お前もだよ！お前らも爆発してんだよ！
subtitles.english: No, you too! You guys also exploded!

subtitles.original: でも強かった。
subtitles.english: But it was strong.

subtitles.original: なんでこの状況で笑っているの！？
subtitles.english: Why are you laughing in this situation!?

subtitles.original: ふざけんな！
subtitles.english: Don't mess with me!

subtitles.original: なんでやり切ったみたいな顔…
subtitles.english: Why that "I did it" look on your faces?

subtitles.original: やり切ったわ。
subtitles.english: I totally did it.

subtitles.original: 全然良くない？
subtitles.english: Wasn't it totally fine?

subtitles.original: え？もうやり切った。
subtitles.english: Eh? I've already done my part.

subtitles.original: あれ？さすがです先輩方。そうだよね。
subtitles.english: Eh? As expected of you seniors. Right?

subtitles.original: やり切ったやり切った。
subtitles.english: Did it, did it.

subtitles.original: 違う違う違う！自分の顔見てみろよ！
subtitles.english: No, no, no! Look at your own faces!

subtitles.original: え？何これ？めっちゃ真っ黒なんだけど！
subtitles.english: Eh? What's this? It's totally black!

subtitles.original: あ、なんか焦げ臭いか、ちょっと。
subtitles.english: Ah, it smells a bit burnt, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: 焦げ臭いどころじゃねえよ！普通に事故ってたぞ！
subtitles.english: It's more than just smelling burnt! It was a total accident!

subtitles.original: あまりにも強すぎる。さすがにこれは失敗かな？
subtitles.english: It's way too strong. This is probably a failure.

subtitles.original: え、失敗かな？
subtitles.english: Eh, a failure?

subtitles.original: そりゃそうだろ。ラプラス、じっとしておけよ！
subtitles.english: Obviously! La+, stay still!

subtitles.original: お前、ラプラス動くのか。
subtitles.english: You... so La+ actually moves.

subtitles.original: で、やってみてどうでしたか？
subtitles.english: So, how was it trying it out?

subtitles.original: いや、思ってるより難しいかもしんない。
subtitles.english: Actually, it might be harder than it looks.

subtitles.original: そう、角がね、デカい。邪魔。
subtitles.english: Yeah, those horns are huge. They're in the way.

subtitles.original: お気づきになられましたか？
subtitles.english: Did you just notice that?

subtitles.original: 気づいちゃった。あれ大変だわ。
subtitles.english: I noticed! That's a lot of work.

subtitles.original: てめぇらおもちゃにしやがって許さねぇからな絶対に！
subtitles.english: I'll never forgive you guys for treating me like a toy!

subtitles.original: なんか言ってるよ。
subtitles.english: She's saying something.

subtitles.original: やばい揺らすな、揺らすな！やめろ！
subtitles.english: Crap, don't shake her! Stop it!

subtitles.original: じゃあ次、ちょっと交代してみましょうか。
subtitles.english: Well then, let's try switching next.

subtitles.original: まだやるのこれ？
subtitles.english: Are we still doing this?

subtitles.original: じゃあクロヱといろは行きましょう。
subtitles.english: Okay, let's go with Chloe and Iroha.

subtitles.original: 一番不安一番不安！お手本を見せてあげてくださいよ。
subtitles.english: I'm so nervous! Please show them how it's done.

subtitles.original: 先輩方にね。
subtitles.english: For the seniors.

subtitles.original: ちょ、やめて！やめてよ！
subtitles.english: Hey, stop! Stop it!

subtitles.original: よいしょ。いろはちゃん待って。
subtitles.english: Heave-ho. Iroha-chan, wait.

subtitles.original: 私を見殺しにするんですか？
subtitles.english: Are you going to let me die?

subtitles.original: 爆発！ムカムカ角 完全攻略できたら10億YMD
subtitles.english: Explosion! Mukamuka Horns. Clear it perfectly for 10 Billion YMD.

subtitles.original: 風真いろは 沙花叉クロヱ
subtitles.english: Kazama Iroha & Sakamata Chloe

subtitles.original: クロヱ、いろは、準備は大丈夫ですか？自信はどうでしょう？
subtitles.english: Chloe, Iroha, are you ready? How's your confidence?

subtitles.original: なんか爆発したら巻き込まれるって聞いたんでマジで嫌なんですけど…
subtitles.english: I heard if it explodes I'll be caught in it, so I really hate this...

subtitles.original: あの、ちょっと爆発させてみたいです。
subtitles.english: But, I kind of want to see it explode.

subtitles.original: 好奇心が勝っているようで。
subtitles.english: Seems your curiosity is winning out.

subtitles.original: ま、なんとかなるしよ。ね、なんとかなるさ。
subtitles.english: Well, it'll work out somehow. Right, it'll be fine.

subtitles.original: じゃあね、ちょっとお手本を見せてもらいましょう。
subtitles.english: Then, let's have you show us a good example.

subtitles.original: それでは爆発ムカムカ角、スタート！
subtitles.english: Now then, Explosion Mukamuka Horns, START!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待っていろはちゃん、命かかってる！
subtitles.english: Wait a minute Iroha-chan, life is on the line!

subtitles.original: いろはちゃんの命が…
subtitles.english: Iroha-chan's life is...

subtitles.original: ラプラスはどうでもいいけど。ごめんたすかり。
subtitles.english: I don't care about La+, but... sorry, thanks.

subtitles.original: お前ら本当にどうでもいいみたいだからな！
subtitles.english: You guys really don't seem to care about me at all!

subtitles.original: あるかな、順調、いい感じいい感じ。
subtitles.english: Is it there? Smooth sailing, looking good.

subtitles.original: あ、大丈夫これ。あー、怖い怖い。
subtitles.english: Ah, is this okay? Ah, scary, scary.

subtitles.original: これどう？これどう？あ、角判定判定…
subtitles.english: How's this? Is the horn being judged...?

subtitles.original: 行ける、行ける！怖い、顔に近い！
subtitles.english: I can do it! Scary, it's so close to the face!

subtitles.original: やめて！待っていろはちゃん、待って待って待って！
subtitles.english: Stop! Wait Iroha-chan, wait wait wait wait!

subtitles.original: ここで考え直そう。一回深呼吸をしろ。
subtitles.english: Let's rethink here. Take a deep breath once.

subtitles.original: うちらの将来のプラン。せーの。
subtitles.english: Our future plans. Ready, and...

subtitles.original: 待て、どこでいく？これの次で行こう。
subtitles.english: Wait, when do we go? Let's go after this one.

subtitles.original: せーの、わー！
subtitles.english: Ready, and... Whoa!

subtitles.original: はい、おーい。残念ながら…いやいや、やり切ったじゃないんだよ。
subtitles.english: Okay, hey. Unfortunately... no no, it's not "we did it."

subtitles.original: ほらこうやって真っ黒になったよ。
subtitles.english: Look, we've turned black like this.

subtitles.original: やったね！
subtitles.english: We did it!

subtitles.original: はい、残念ながら失敗となります。
subtitles.english: Yes, unfortunately it's a failure.

subtitles.original: え？残念とかじゃねーから！
subtitles.english: Eh? It's not just "unfortunate"!

subtitles.original: お前の角がでっけーからでござる！
subtitles.english: It's because your horns are so big!

subtitles.original: もっと慎重にやれよ下手くそ。
subtitles.english: Do it more carefully, you unskilled lot.

subtitles.original: でもまあラプラスだし。角デカいでござる。
subtitles.english: Well, it is La+... her horns are huge.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、角デカすぎる！あ、それさっきも聞いた。削ってくれ。頼む。
subtitles.english: Seriously, the horns are too big! I heard that earlier! Shave them down, please!

subtitles.original: 次、ちょっとラプラスから愛されているこよりと、信頼を置かれているルイでやりましょうか。
subtitles.english: Next, let's have Koyori, who is loved by La+, and Lui, who is trusted by her, do it.

subtitles.original: いや、ここは頭脳を見せていきましょうよ。
subtitles.english: No, let's show our brains here.

subtitles.original: エリートにやって…
subtitles.english: Do it like an elite...

subtitles.original: おぎゃって言っていいんだよ。
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry like a baby.

subtitles.original: は、いや、ちょっとこの状況はさすがに喜べない…
subtitles.english: Wait, I can't exactly enjoy this situation...

subtitles.original: 爆発！ムカムカ角 完全攻略できたら10億YMD
subtitles.english: Explosion! Mukamuka Horns. Clear it perfectly for 10 Billion YMD.

subtitles.original: 鷹嶺ルイ 博衣こより
subtitles.english: Takane Lui & Hakui Koyori

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと本当に信じてるからね。
subtitles.english: Wait, I'm really believing in you.

subtitles.original: 何を？
subtitles.english: In what?

subtitles.original: お前らをだよ！お前らがクリアすることだよ！
subtitles.english: In you guys! That you guys will clear it!

subtitles.original: 頑張ります！
subtitles.english: We'll do our best!

subtitles.original: 山田ルイ54世の絆、頑張ります。
subtitles.english: The Yamada-Lui 54th generation bond, we'll do our best.
